attributes.action: Fully disclose all information on UFOs and any alian technology developed by the UK and the USA even if it will distry the Oil industry and any other industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government discloses information regarding UFO and Alien technology then our Environmental impact could potentially reduce to zero.  Although this will not be disclosed as the government would like to TAX everyone for carbon emissions as it is a new source of income for them to spend on rubbish we don't need!!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
